# sitsdraft

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/OldLipe/sitsdraft/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/OldLipe/sitsdraft/actions)
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of sitsdraft is to create a common directory setup for an easy reproducibility. 

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("OldLipe/sitsdraft")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(sitsdraft)
## basic example code
```
